entries.title: Prosecutors charge 6 people for allegedly waging massive DDoS attacks
entries.description: 48 Internet domains associated with the services have also been seized.

entries.title: Meet Ghostwriter, a haunted AI-powered typewriter that talks to you
entries.description: Custom typewriter hack uses Arduino, Rapsberry Pi, and GPT-3 to dramatic effect.

entries.title: The day the plastic music died: Epic shutting down Rock Band and other servers
entries.description: Rock Band, Unreal, and other games at Epic lose online services on Jan. 24.

entries.title: Scientists discover a new supergroup of rare single-celled predators
entries.description: Rare microbes form two branches of a supergroup, a classification above kingdoms.

entries.title: Musk may try to deny severance to thousands laid off by Twitter, report says
entries.description: Musk's attorney, Alex Spiro, out but still representing Twitter on pending cases.

entries.title: “Impossible” to track: China gives up on COVID case count amid explosive outbreak
entries.description: In an abrupt reversal, China ended mandatory testing last week.

entries.title: YouTube moderation bots will start issuing warnings, 24-hour bans
entries.description: New automated moderation program does not seem to allow for human intervention.

entries.title: Diplodocus may have been one cool dinosaur—thanks to its skin
entries.description: A skin of porous scales may have helped keep dinosaurs' metabolism from overheating.

entries.title: Subaru warns Ascent owners to park outside due to fire risk
entries.description: Subaru is recalling 271,694 2019–2022 Ascent SUVs due to faulty heater wiring.

entries.title: Twitter suspends @ElonJet plane-tracking bot after Musk pledged to leave it up
entries.description: Twitter claims @ElonJet broke the rules but hasn't suspended other similar bots.

entries.title: Tesla rolls out Steam game support for newest vehicle models
entries.description: Over 6,000 "Deck Verified" games are now playable on the 17-inch central console.

entries.title: Record lows on the Mississippi: How climate change is altering large rivers
entries.description: Water levels in some of the world's largest rivers have hit record lows in 2022.

entries.title: “Pure and deadly greed”: Lawmakers slam Pfizer’s 400% price hike on COVID shots
entries.description: Senators Warren and Welch urged Pfizer to back down from "unseemly profiteering."

entries.title: Space debris expert: Orbits will be lost—and people will die—later this decade
entries.description: "Flexing geopolitical muscles in space to harm others has already happened."
